mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (title, content, user_id, category, forum_color, tags, view_count, like_count, comment_count, is_top, is_essence, status, creation_time, last_update_time ) VALUES (#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{forumColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tags,typeHandler=com.baomidou.mybatisplus.extension.handlers.JacksonTypeHandler}, #{viewCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{likeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commentCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isTop,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{isEssence,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, category = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, forum_color = #{forumColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tags = #{tags,typeHandler=com.baomidou.mybatisplus.extension.handlers.JacksonTypeHandler}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT tag, COUNT(*) AS count FROM (SELECT JSON_UNQUOTE(tags_element) AS tag FROM post p, JSON_TABLE( p.tags, '$[*]' COLUMNS (tags_element VARCHAR(50) PATH '$') ) AS tj WHERE p.status = 'Active') t GROUP BY tag ORDER BY count DESC limit #{limit, jdbcType=INTEGER}
